field.name: Administer vitamin A according to schedule, as given below:
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding according to the feeding recommendations for HIV-exposed children
Refer mother/caregiver and child to a nearby health facility for HIV care and antiretroviral therapy
Counsel mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Counsel mother/caregiver to follow-up in 14 days, then monthly for 3 months and subsequently for every 3 months or as per immunization schedule
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
